import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { cart, logoText, user } from "../assets"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CartContext from "../context/cartContext"; export const Header = () => { const cartItems = useContext(CartContext); const [cartQty, setCartQty] = useState(cartItems.cartArray); useEffect(() => { setCartQty(cartItems.cartArray.length); }, [cartItems.cartArray]); return (
